packages.name: jadempinky/pinkyflow

documentation.usage: To use the framework, include it in your PHP file and initialize the necessary modules based on your requirements. Example: `$user = new PinkyFlow\Modules\User();`.
documentation.configuration: Edit the `config/config.php` to define your database connection, API keys, or other settings needed by the modules.
documentation.customization: You can extend any module in the `src/Modules` directory by adding your own custom modules. Ensure that custom modules follow PSR-4 standards and are placed within the correct namespace.

packages.description: A PHP framework that makes your code flow like water. PinkyFlow provides essential modules like user management, shopping cart, and commenting, while maintaining flexibility for custom extensions.
